extendedInfo.description: Save a text message (SMS) and three mobile phone numbers so when you are in a dangerous situation or emergency situation you can very quickly send the stored message. This is possible through the simple application interface where once stored phone numbers and text message, send the warning of danger is very fast. This application can save you in a situation where you need urgent help.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t deliver
reviews.comment: I even bought.  The pro version. After finding the app to only successfully send 20% of the time I\'ve decided not to count on it to work. Reliably
reviews.author: Tara P

reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
reviews.comment: But would be better if it exited the button screen on press, its not clear to the visually impaired the sms has been sent
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very easy and useful
reviews.comment: I would have liked to have this application before, as I would have helped in some situations of danger. A ten for Emergency SMS!. Now I can quickly send a text message to my father, my brother and my girlfriend at the same time if anything happens to me!! Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User
